tool.name: Compute checksums for PSM analysis files
tool.command: ln "${specinput}" "${specinput.name}" && ln "${psminput}" "${psminput.name}" && ln "${mzidinput}" "${mzidinput.name}" && ln "${metricsinput}" "${metricsinput.name}" && ${__tool_directory__}/../lib/cptacdcc/cksum.sh -f output.cksum . && mv -f output.cksum "${output}"
